org.jmc
Class PreviewPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  org.jmc.PreviewPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.event.MouseInputListener
public class PreviewPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, javax.swing.event.MouseInputListener

Panel used for displaying the preview of the map.

Author:
danijel
See Also:
Serialized Form

Main redraw procedure (run only when something changes).

Parameters:

                     int x,

Add a chunk image to the preview.

Parameters:
img - image of the individual blocks
height - height map
x - x location of the chunk on the screen
y - y location of the chunk on the screen

getChunkBounds

public java.awt.Rectangle getChunkBounds()
Retrieves the coordinate boundaries of chunks that are visible on the preview. Used by some loaders to determine which chunks to load.

Returns:
bounds of drawn chunks
